verses.verse: And Miriam <S%H4813><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> against Moses <S%H4872><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H182><s%> of the Ethiopian <S%H3569><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> he had married: <S%H3947><s%> for he had married <S%H3947><s%> an Ethiopian <S%H3569><s%> woman. <S%H802><s%>

And they said, <S%H559><s%> Has the LORD <S%H3068><s%> indeed spoken <S%H1696><s%> only <S%H7535><s%> by Moses? <S%H4872><s%> has he not spoken <S%H1696><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> by us? And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> it.

(Now the man <S%H376><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> meek, <S%H6035><s%> above all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H120><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were on the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth. <S%H127><s%>)

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> suddenly <S%H6597><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and to Miriam, <S%H4813><s%> Come <S%H3318><s%> out you three <S%H7969><s%> to the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%> And they three <S%H7969><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> out.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> in the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of the cloud, <S%H6051><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> in the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H168><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and Miriam: <S%H4813><s%> and they both <S%H8147><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> forth.

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Hear <S%H8085><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> my words: <S%H1697><s%> If <S%H518><s%> there be a prophet <S%H5030><s%> among you, I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will make myself known <S%H3045><s%> to him in a vision, <S%H4758><s%> and will speak <S%H1696><s%> to him in a dream. <S%H2472><s%>
My servant <S%H5650><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> is not so, <S%H3651><s%> who <S%H1931><s%> is faithful <S%H539><s%> in all my house. <S%H1004><s%>

With him will I speak <S%H1696><s%> mouth <S%H6310><s%> to mouth, <S%H6310><s%> even apparently, <S%H4758><s%> and not in dark <S%H2420><s%> speeches; <S%H2420><s%> and the similitude <S%H8544><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall he behold: <S%H5027><s%> why <S%H4069><s%> then were you not afraid <S%H3372><s%> to speak <S%H1696><s%> against my servant <S%H5650><s%> Moses? <S%H4872><s%>
And the anger <S%H639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against them; and he departed. <S%H3212><s%>

And the cloud <S%H6051><s%> departed <S%H5493><s%> from off <S%H5921><s%> the tabernacle; <S%H168><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> Miriam <S%H4813><s%> became leprous, <S%H6879><s%> white as snow: <S%H7950><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> looked <S%H6437><s%> on Miriam, <S%H4813><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> she was leprous. <S%H6879><s%>

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Alas, <S%H994><s%> my lord, <S%H113><s%> I beseech <S%H4994><s%> you, lay <S%H7896><s%> not the sin <S%H2403><s%> on us, wherein <S%H834><s%> we have done foolishly, <S%H2973><s%> and wherein <S%H834><s%> we have sinned. <S%H2398><s%>

Let her not be as one dead, <S%H4191><s%> of whom the flesh <S%H1320><s%> is half <S%H2677><s%> consumed <S%H398><s%> when <S%H834><s%> he comes <S%H3318><s%> out of his mother's <S%H517><s%> womb. <S%H7358><s%>
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> cried <S%H6817><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Heal <S%H7495><s%> her now, <S%H4994><s%> O God, <S%H410><s%> I beseech <S%H4994><s%> you.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> If her father <S%H1><s%> had but spit <S%H3417><s%> in her face, <S%H6440><s%> should she not be ashamed <S%H3637><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days? <S%H3117><s%> let her be shut <S%H5462><s%> out from the camp <S%H4264><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> and after <S%H310><s%> that let her be received <S%H622><s%> in again.

And Miriam <S%H4813><s%> was shut <S%H5462><s%> out from the camp <S%H4264><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days: <S%H3117><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%> not till <S%H5704><s%> Miriam <S%H4813><s%> was brought <S%H622><s%> in again.
And afterward <S%H310><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> removed <S%H5265><s%> from Hazeroth, <S%H2698><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Paran. <S%H6290><s%>
